name: Nowhere High: Chapter 1
description: It’s hard to tell what exactly the school is. From first glance it seems like some sort of dream world that only exists in your head, but once you realize you can’t wake up, things seem to change for the worst. In this simple Visual Novel Dating Sim you will meet all kinds of friendly faces and carefully choose your prom date for a very special dance! Though, it’s best to be aware of how heavy your decisions weigh. There could be more going on than whats visible on the surface...
